resources.string: This application shows the weather data which include location, time, description, wind, pressure, humidity and temperature. There are following features:

1. Top Cities: This list has some predefined top indian cities.

2. Map Locations: This list will display the location which we will select from map.

3. Bookmark: This list will display bookmarked location selected from `Top cities` or `Map locations`.
On clicking on the any list item, the weather forecast detail screen will display.
On clicking this icon in any list, location named on the row will be stored in bookmarked list.
On clicking this icon in any list, location from that list will be removed.
This is the menu button to open setting or menu screen. Through setting screen you can clean the stored locations and bookmarks. There you can change the temperature unit system also.
